text: The Aitchison College is Pakistan's most prestigious school and college.The Aitchison College, Lahore, official website It is in the old and historical Punjabi city of Lahore. The school was started during British colonial rule, in 1886. It was first called the 'Punjab Chiefs' School and College'. It is named after Sir Charles Umpherston Aitchison, who was Lieutenant Governor of the Punjab. Only boys aged 4 to 19 go there. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Lahore Category:1886 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in Pakistan
title: Aitchison College
